this is a set of two door stoppers have a look at the snake 1 these two characters also make huggable draggable cuddle-able toys direct pdf link http //botherthebirds net/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/dawgsnake pdf 2 **materials **
- 5 oz taupe light brown - 1/2 oz black - 1/2 oz color for collar - bit of white - dacron batting - 4 lbs dry beans - yarn needle > previously available at the crochet works http //www sarahanns com/crochetworks/dawg html 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sentry-snake 2 https //web archive org/web/20150306152713/http //botherthebirds net/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/dawgsnake pdf
